data.prayer: Lord, please give the 293 believers in the county of Bannu the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bannu, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 293 believers in Bannu to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary: On average, 25 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Bannu, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, it’s possible most of the 103,756 lost people in  Bannu, N.W.F.P., Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 105,100 citizens of Bannu, N.W.F.P., Pakistan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bannu, N.W.F.P., Pakistan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 293 believers in Bannu against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, teach the 293 believers in the county of Bannu the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
